titleStmt.title: Tax Receipts (poll, bath and dike tax)

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Kales son of Pamonthes son of Paeris whose mother is Tme( )daughter of Pamonthes paid on account of the poll tax of Memnoneia for the 12th year 16 drachmas. 12th year of Nero the lord, Pharmouthi 24. Likewise, on the 19th of the month of Kaisarios for the bath tax, 4 drachmas. Likewise, on the 22nd, 4 drachmas. Likewise, in the 13th year on the 27th of the month of Sebastos, 3 drachmas, 1 obol, in sum 2 drachmas, 5 obols. Paames the elder, son of Paeris son of Psenmonthes paid on account of the poll tax of Memnoneia for the 12th year 4 drachmas. 12th year of Nero the lord, 27th of Pharmouthi. Likewise, on Pachon the 10th, 8 drachmas. Likewise, on the 2nd of Pauni 4 drachmas. Likewise, on Epeiph 4, 4 drachmas. Likewise, on the 6th of the month of Kaisarios on account of the bath tax, 4 drachmas. Likewise, in the 13th year on the 27th of the month of Sebastos on account of the dike tax, 3 drachmas, 1 1/2 obols, in sum 2 drachmas, 5 1/2 obols.
